title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for the limits

1 point is earned for the answer

ln(x) = x - 2 when x = 0.15859 and 3.14619.

Let S = 0.15859 and T = 3.14619

Area of R= ∫ S T ( ln( x )−( x−2 ) ) dx=1.949
